subject: Diana here
body:
Imagine up t0 three th0usand d0llars a day simply returning ph0ne calls! Y0u can d0 it and we will get y0u started s0 call the inf0 line t0day.

Middle age is having a choice of two temptations and choosing the one that will get you home earlier.
